segments.text: I ’ m very fond of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but do you love me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: why ? You mean a lot to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why didn ’ t you answer my question ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you love me ? come on , I ’ m eager to hear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you know that I care for you . I---I ’ m proud of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t cherish your words , dear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I---I don ’ t feel like saying it .
segments.speaker: S2
